form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Markey introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

form.official-title: To amend the Federal Oil and Gas Royalty Management Act of 1982 and the Outer Continental Shelf Lands Act to modify certain penalties to deter oil spills.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Oil Spill Deterrent Act.

section.header: Penalties for drilling on Federal land
section.text: Section 109 of the Federal Oil and Gas Royalty Management Act of 1982 (30 U.S.C. 1719) is amended—

paragraph.text: in subsection (b), by striking $5,000 and inserting $100,000; and
in subsection (g), by inserting, , or, after notice and an opportunity for public comment, by regulation increase after reduce.

section.header: Penalties for drilling on outer Continental Shelf
section.text: Section 24(b)(1) of the Outer Continental Shelf Lands Act (43 U.S.C. 1350(b)(1)) is amended—

paragraph.text: in the first sentence by striking $20,000 and inserting $250,000; and
by adding After notice and an opportunity for public comment, the Secretary may by regulation increase the penalty specified in this paragraph. after the period at the end.
